subject: Simsonn VAM Pro Linear Motor
description_text:
Hi there,

I have the Sinsonn Pro Pedal set perched from Amazon May 2024.
I am looking to buy The VAM Pro Linear motor but I am unsure which control
box I need?
Will both of them work or do I need a specific one?

conversations.body_text: Hi Derek Ofori-Atta,  You only need to purchase the PlusX control box.Â        https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-vam-pedals-haptic-reactor?variant=51351053533498
That's great, thank you very much.
